website_summaries.verdict: A thick, sturdy steel construction makes these shepherd's hooks ideal for heavier items like plants and flower pots.
pros: Solid steel construction is thicker than many
Holds up well under extra weight
Height is ideal for flower baskets and hummingbirds feeders
Powder coated finish withstands the elements
cons: Installation shaves off a few inches of height
Might not be tall enough for bug zappers

customer_reviews.title: WAY too short - by the time you hang a bird feeder/flower basket, etc. on it, the bottom of the item will be 2.5" off the ground
customer_reviews.text: Very short. My fault because I did not read the description thoroughly. I wanted it for a bird feeder but while the birds feed, cats may feed on the birds - it is THAT low to the ground. By the time you push the two prongs thoroughly into the ground the very TOP of the hook is only 48" from the ground ....... when you actually hang something on it, like a flower basket or a birdfeeder it hangs down to only about 2.5" from the ground. Not useful for the purpose I intended it for, but maybe useful for others.
customer_reviews.author: Nittfan

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to hang bird feeders from in my back yard. We recently moved in and our trees are not yet big enough to support feeders so I planned to use these until that point. I'm very happy with how well they hold the ground and don't tip over. I live in AZ and this time of year it is very windy and I have trouble keeping things from tipping over but have yet to have a problem with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: GREAT, STURDY, WEIGHTY HOOKS!
customer_reviews.text: These are durable, high quality shepherd's hooks. They are wrought iron and solid, not hollow. The prongs that stick into the ground are sturdy, too. I bought some exactly like these at Lowe's about 5 or 6 years ago and loved them so much, I went back to buy more and they were out. I never saw them there again. These are just like my old ones from Lowe's and I believe these will last a long time, too. I use them to hang my solar garden lights on and they are more than adequate for this task. We have really strong winds here, too, and these hooks never move. A really good buy!
customer_reviews.author: L. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect!!!!!  Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these hooks. I purchased the lights on Amazon too which I also love. Not sure why people are saying they are too short? I think they are the perfect height. Above ground - they sit about 3 1/2 feet. I didn't want them towering over everything else so for me they are just tall enough. They are very sturdy too - they do not come in separate pieces.
customer_reviews.author: WestViewPark234

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Mine just arrived. I like it very much. It was not difficult to pound into my hard clay soil and is very sturdy. It's one piece so it does not spin. My bird feeder (long tube style) is made of glass and wrought iron , is quite heavy, and holds 1.5 pounds of bird seed. I was concerned that 1) it might bend the hook (it doesn't), and 2) it might be too low to the ground to attract the birds (they don't seem to mind). Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: Strong, Sturdy Shepherd Hook - Plant Hanger, Bird Feeder hanger, etc.
customer_reviews.text: This very sturdy, well constructed Shepherd hook is being used in my yard to hold a hummingbird feeder. I was able to get the two feet pretty well into the grass and dirt so it won't fall over. The wind is blowing and it is only moving slightly. I could also see using this for a bird bath or bird feeder if I can't attract enough hummingbirds. Basically you can use this anyplace in your garden. I like it right outside my office window. ~The Rebecca Review
customer_reviews.author: The Rebecca ReviewTop Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: Tougher than 9mm
customer_reviews.text: I used these to hang hardened steel gong targets for plinking. I wasn't sure how they'd hold up to inevitable hits, but figured they were relatively inexpensive so I'd give them a shot. I don't know how many times we've hit that thing, mostly with pistol calibers, but I've bent it straight a couple times and it's got some dings. The thing is way tougher than I'd hoped, and I figure that if I t works for to shoot at, it'd probably do whatever anyone else might want from it.
customer_reviews.author: mathias ringle

customer_reviews.title: it works.
customer_reviews.text: I am still using this for a fairly heavy hanging basket with potting soil and a Fuschia plant. You need just the right soil to hold them up, and even when you do, the full planter container pulls them over a bit off balance. Also, the height is a bit misleading. Be sure to subtract the part that goes into the ground, and also allow for the hanging down of the plant. But that may be the nature of shepherd hooks. And, as I say, I am still using this for one plant, but it hangs pretty close to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Tall Bamboo

customer_reviews.title: Strong and coated, holds quite a bit of weight without bending.
customer_reviews.text: GrayBunny really makes good hooks for holding up to the weather and whatever you hang on it. I ordered two 48" hooks: one I hang two bird feeders from and the other two beautiful Climbing Susan plants and they don't bend to weight when I'm filling bird feeders. They also didn't bow when I hit a rock putting one in, they are thick and sturdy enough to really get them set in the ground. Very happy with my purchase and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C.

customer_reviews.title: This is good. It is fairly solid
customer_reviews.text: This is good. It is fairly solid. So far no issues with those persky squirrels. My only issue is it’s not very high off the ground. The 48 inches is from top to bottom. By the time you drop in into the ground, you are at just under 42 inches, then the bird feeder depending on size will hang down from there. Again four stars good quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for apt dwelling
customer_reviews.text: It's working out perfectly for what I intended to use it for. My problem is living in an apartment we dont have the ability to hang plants or anything else. I wanted to have a hummingbird feeder on my patio and this seemed like a good way to make this work. I stick it in a large planter I have and the hummingbirds haven't stopped visiting my patio.
customer_reviews.author: James J Leonick

customer_reviews.title: Once this actually goes in the ground it is too ...
customer_reviews.text: Once this actually goes in the ground it is too short. Be sure and measure it really carefully to get how much height you really need. Between the bottom of the curve and the top of the ground, once in there was about 2 feet. Looks are deceptive from the picture. There was no way the the birdfeeder bought with this would work in the 2 foot space. We got a much taller one instead.
customer_reviews.author: A. Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Smaller less heavy-duty than expected, but seems to be plenty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: OK I guess I didn't read the description thoroughly - it's way thinner and shorter than I was expecting. The metal is not as heavy gauge as I thought it would be, but it seems to be working and is fairly sturdy enough. Just note, if you're expecting one of those heavy duty squared edge hooks, this isn't it. Overall, though it was more petite/dainty than expected, the price is reasonable and it seems to be holding up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kari JoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: works great for my bird bath
customer_reviews.text: It’s what I expected, works well for what I needed it for. My bird bath looks great hanging from it. I just started using it so not sure if it is rust resistant or not but I like it and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndee

customer_reviews.title: Short
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made. It would’ve been great if I would’ve thought about how tall 48” is. I bought it to hang a bird feeder on in my front yard. Luckily the tree I put it up against is a new tree so it doesnt look too odd. And the birds have found the feeder. I wouldn’t suggest it height wise to hang a bird feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Fetterolf

customer_reviews.title: Solves my problem
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to suspend my hummingbird feeder, without being able to hang it from a hook or branch above my window box. I was able to insert thishook into the window box soil and it is sturdy enough to support the feeder without bending.
customer_reviews.author: alm711

customer_reviews.title: like a couple of other companies' Shepard hooks
customer_reviews.text: This is one piece instead of two interlocking ones, like a couple of other companies' Shepard hooks, so it seems really sturdy and despite the wind storms I've been getting it's stayed where I've placed it. I am pretty pleased with this and am considering grabbing a second.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: shorter than what I expected but is exactly height advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy. Color looks great. It is exactly the height it says and I really did not realize it was so short. I found the perfect place to use it however. But if your like me and in a hurry and do not pay attention to details, this is not one of the tall hooks that I would put a hanging basket on. It is perfect with a bird feeder right off the porch.
customer_reviews.author: leigh P.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cheap - the ideal combination
customer_reviews.text: I got this to hold a bug catcher. It’s quite sturdy and doesn’t bend over with the weight on it or swing a ton in the wind. The second leg that presses into the ground is solidly welded to the main leg. For a lot less than other options it is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: T. Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Best quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought four of these. These are heavy duty, very well painted and top quality products. Should last many years. I'm going to order more! I have to admit the package was busted open but the hooks were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Magic Biddie

customer_reviews.title: Sleak yet sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: My wife is ecstatic! It is very sturdy and simple to put in the ground. The box it was delivered in was freaking huge. We thought somebody delivered a refrigerator. Then we opened it and here was this very slender object. That was the only thing that made us scratch our heads.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya Bizness

customer_reviews.title: Am enjoying watching birds and squirrels cooperatively eating bird seeds ...
customer_reviews.text: Am enjoying watching birds and squirrels cooperatively eating bird seeds placed inside Graybunny Shephard Hook attached bird feeder. Birds eat seeds found inside bird feeder; squirrels eat seeds dropping below bird feeder, upon ground. Suggested is also offering Graybunny Shephard Hook in large size, say sixty inches. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Grayken

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hooks. One arrived bent though.
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are excellent hooks to hang solar lanterns on. Perfect height and durable. A 3rd prong would really be nice for security in windy days though. One was bent at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to set up, good value!
customer_reviews.text: Strong and sturdy and perfect height for my flower and fern garden lanterns. Looking forward to setting them up once the oak trees are done dropping their leaves... here in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Florida lady

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Received on time. The are very sturdy. Shorter than I expected (even though I knew the height). I didn’t realize the full height or length was including the portion that goes into the ground. I would order again but taller.
customer_reviews.author: NJJ

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Of the 4 received, 3 of them have broken - the weld at the fork broke on each, and with minimal insertion pressure into the ground. Don't waste your money. Note, however, that the GrayBunny GB-6817 shepherd hooks are quite robust - they sit taller, are made with 1/2" material, and the fork weld is quite a bit stronger than the 6814's.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Stamp

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I gave this away as it did not work for me. The ad showed it as a hummingbird feeder hook, but once put in the ground, it is too low for hummingbirds. I gave it away!
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to securely hang my reptile heat lamps.. I wanted something that would be sturdy, etc. I use zip ties to connect it to their super tall habitat. This is made of good quality not like cheaper reptile hooks. I have been highly recommending it in the reptile world and plan on buying a few more!
customer_reviews.author: N.T. Hikergal42

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any Yard
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to hang candle lanterns from Xmas Tree Shops for our 4th of July party. Metal is thick and nearly unbendable from its shape. Paint was solid black with a smooth shine and fully covered every inch with no exposed metal. H hook ground spikes stayed firm in the ground and did not bend when placed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Spires

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: We had bought some other ones before we bought these. These are constructed a whole lot nicer they’ve got a nicer weld on them. other ones that we bought broke
customer_reviews.author: Julee Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I used my hook for a project in the back yard and love how it turned out. I was worried that my watering can would weigh too much but that wasn't an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Y Booth

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: It’s very lightweigh and thin. If you want to use it for a hanging plant basket I would not buy this one. It’s ok for a wind chime or something lightweight. It bent over when I hung my plant on it.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and can hold some weight.
customer_reviews.text: I got these to hold platform bird feeders that I put out for mourning doves. They easily went into the ground and hold the feeder full of seed and doves along with other birds just fine. I find them nice and sturdy and they don't move much when the birds are in the feeders or perching on top.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time with good packaging and in good condition. Quality, strong metal, easy to insert into ground, exactly as advertised. Looks very nice. Great deal too, saw a similar item at a local garden store yesterday that was twice the price!
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaRN

customer_reviews.title: Will order from GrayBunny Again!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to hold glass hummingbird feeder. Very sturdy, went into the ground easily, and didn't budge during three consecutive days of wind and rain storms. Received follow-up email shortly afterwards to confirm receipt and satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Jers

customer_reviews.title: They worked great
customer_reviews.text: The hooks were just what I was expecting to receive, thanks so much for getting delivered to me so quickly... God Bless
customer_reviews.author: Judith Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Butterfly chimes hangin g from hook.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted to hang a butterfly chime on. We took it to the cematary where my husband is as of 8/24/17. It looks beautiful when the wind blows the chimes make beautiful music. Your hook was what we were looking for. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene E. Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Not solid iron
customer_reviews.text: Too flimsy. I can only use lightweight plastic planter. Just go to big box store and buy a real wrought iron product.
customer_reviews.author: charry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, stands upright, strong, looks good to showcase my handing red cardinal solar bird set.
customer_reviews.author: Diane K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Went in easy, and the finish still looks perfect after being outside for a year through winter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well designed with heavy gauge metal to hold the heaviest potted plant.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Well designed, Heavy gauge metal. They are a perfect addition to my yard and perfect height for what I needed them for. They are strong enough to hold a new sized hanging pot with dirt and flowers.
customer_reviews.author: K Haltman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my hook! The quality is excellent--especially for the price. I put in in my front yard directly in front of the kitchen window and hung a hummingbird feeder on it. It looks so cute! I pounded it into the ground using a rubber hammer so as not to damage the coating and it worked great. Very sturdy. Exactly what I wanted. Thank you! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: KittyCat

customer_reviews.title: Great/easy product
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Holds my bird feeder outside and haven’t had any issues. Minus the squirrels that climb it
customer_reviews.author: Maria sederes

customer_reviews.title: Light weight 4 feet shepherds hook
customer_reviews.text: This is a mini shepherd’s hook that I’m going to use to hang out my front yard hummingbird feeder. While it will work out nicely, it would not be strong enough for a hanging plant or another kind of bird feeder
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the buying experience with the seller as well ...
customer_reviews.text: I was having a difficult time finding a 4 ft shepherd's hook for a yard project in local stores when I found this one on Amazon. Not only was it well priced it is much sturdier than those sold locally. I am very pleased with the buying experience with the seller as well as the quality of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie R.

customer_reviews.title: Premium? Extra Thick?
customer_reviews.text: This hook is neither extra thick nor anything approaching "premium". It's thin and weak and it sucks. Simple as that.
customer_reviews.author: MAG

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for what I need
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little more heavy duty but better than the reall junky ones
customer_reviews.author: JodiRealtor

customer_reviews.title: Good price and nice size
customer_reviews.text: Great height for a hanging planter in front of your house. It's holding a hanging planter well, but may be more suitable for lighter objects such as lanterns or bird feeders.
customer_reviews.author: jovan

customer_reviews.title: Its a hook, could be more stable
customer_reviews.text: It's a hook, can't say I'm thrilled nor disappointed with it. The tines that go into the ground could be a little long so it would be a little more stable. It works for what I needed it for though.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky X TV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beehive
customer_reviews.text: We used these to create a wind break for a beehive so that we could hang the hornet traps from them as well. Perfect all around.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Kohler

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bowed a little with a heavy hanging basket but is holding up nicely so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They take a licken and keep on ticken. I ...
customer_reviews.text: They take a licken and keep on ticken. I used these to hold my ar500 plates for my little at home firing range. One of them got hit by a stray 30 cal round and is missing 3/4s of the bar. And it still holds up my 1/2 ar500 8 inch ringer!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Zieten

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not very strong.
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, but it's very short and not very sturdy. It's decent for the price but it was hard to get it installed because it's a little bendy. You can't really hang anything too heavy on it or it tips over. I hung this adorable little latern on it and it looks very cute now, but it's definitely not meant to hang anything for heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Not good in sandy soil in Florida. Good product elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: toots62001

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey!
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but just realized it’s wayyyyyyy overpriced. Other sellers have sets for much cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Gracie790

customer_reviews.title: * High Quality & Best Price *
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well made... used three of these to hold hummingbird feeders but they are strong enough to hold heavy plants... took a while to research as I needed high quality, visually appealing, non-rust for a good price.. very happy with the quality and price.. thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Mickeysail

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat flimsy in terms of weight support.
customer_reviews.text: they do not support much weight and in that way we are disappointed. I guess okay w/ bird house or feeder. If they had been Prime purchase, we probably return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These shepherd hooks are not very sturdy. They may hold up a feeder or other small decoration, but do not seem to work well for hanging plants. Mine is constantly leaning over.
customer_reviews.author: Laura N.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good purchase for my hanging plants to sit in my yard love will be purchasing again
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: They are not very tall or strong. Mine arrived bent.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected once installed in the ground but good quality
customer_reviews.author: Miriam klier

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Tried to insert the hook into the ground by tapping on the bottom prongs, but they broke off. Cheaply made. Unless you want to insert the hook into very soft dirt or sand, don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Guy

customer_reviews.title: just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I wanted to display a beautiful Christmas present of a yard decoration. It's sturdy and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Merry S. Streeter

customer_reviews.title: well made an durable
customer_reviews.text: Many uses of which I take advantage of, which include hanging deer chasers and bird feeders
customer_reviews.author: John Felth

customer_reviews.title: works great. Is a little shorter than I thought
customer_reviews.text: works great. Is a little shorter than I thought. But I should have read the specifications more cautiously. I am using it to hang the Lumio book lamp so a taller hook would have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gan

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Good buy for the price, and is excellent for hanging the solar lanterns in my garden.
customer_reviews.author: ccommons

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty hooks
customer_reviews.text: I love these hooks. They go in the ground easily by just standing on them, then put your flower pot or bird house on it and it is done. I should have ordered more except there will be so many in the yard I won't have room for a flower bed.
customer_reviews.author: carol graf-haslam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed it for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed it for. You can hang a Flower Basket on it, a bird feeder if it's close to the ground. Size is pretty good. Seems sturdy enough. I'm currently pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: AC75

customer_reviews.title: Seems to have a nice black finish resistant to scratching
customer_reviews.text: Smaller diameter metal than anticipated but fully supports a full size bug zapper without flexing. Seems to have a nice black finish resistant to scratching.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Strong structure
customer_reviews.text: Strong. I have very very hard soil, rocky, and dry (desert climate). Any shepherd's hook that doesn't have strength would bend and break. This GrayBunny version is solid and after pounding in the stakes to get it into the ground, it stays upright and looking great.
customer_reviews.author: LJohnson

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty sturdy, a little shorter than I thought it ...
customer_reviews.text: The squirrels in our yard cant seem to manage balancing on this without putting enough weight on the feeder to shut the squirrel doors. It is pretty sturdy, a little shorter than I thought it would be, but still too tall for the squirrels.
customer_reviews.author: redstar

customer_reviews.title: great height for hummingbird feeders
customer_reviews.text: great height for hummingbird feeders, very solid feel too, not afraid it'll fall over as the feeder swings in the wind. the finish is tough too. Great value compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B

customer_reviews.title: Make sure of the length you need.
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, just what I wanted. My fault ordered to short but we got it fixed great. Completely my fault. Product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Judy L. Warming

customer_reviews.title: I used this to hang a steel plate for target ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this to hang a steel plate for target practice. It took a direct shot to its center from 357 at 30 feet and its still standing and holding up the metal plate. Very rugged.
customer_reviews.author: lazyoldsun

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect to use for the humming bird feeder
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to use for the humming bird feeder. I'm sure I will find plenty of other uses for it once the hummingbirds switch back over to my flowers next spring. Good heavy duty quality and looks really nice
customer_reviews.author: Luca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, sturdy hook at perfect height for my use
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy hook! Sinks deep enough in ground that it doesn't get too top heavy & pull out of ground. I use this for an oriole feeder, but I tested out a heavy hanging flower pot on it & it stayed up just fine! Would definitely order this product again!
customer_reviews.author: taptrap12Top Contributor: Cross-Stitch

customer_reviews.title: it takes more than a day to decide if they are any good
customer_reviews.text: I just received them, it takes more than a day to decide if they are any good
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Turkey feed holder
customer_reviews.text: We use it to hang our bird feeder. the turkeys use it. Appears to be working good.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect. I am hoping they have a taller one ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hang my humming bird feeder on. It is perfect. I am hoping they have a taller one so I can hang a few more and stagger the heights. This one was the perfect height...and to think I almost bought a shorter one. A Warning though. It came in a flat box and my husband almost threw it away because he thought it was garbage someone put on our porch.
customer_reviews.author: April Elizabeth Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: THE GREATEST HOOKS I HAVE SEEN TO DATE!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, now these are how hooks are supposed to be made. I have lanterns on these. The lanterns are big and probably weigh about 2 pounds each. They are standing proud in the yard. I highly recommend these strong shepherd's hooks. Quality all the way!
customer_reviews.author: kjdoodle

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Great price just what I was looking for. However I am going to look for the 54”. Instead of the 48”
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: ... into the ground to anchor it would probably work better if they were longer
customer_reviews.text: The prongs that go into the ground to anchor it would probably work better if they were longer
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fussell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hook, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hook! It is exactly as pictured. It is sturdy with a beautiful finish. I placed a bird feeder (~1.25 pounds) and this hook can hold much more weight. The price is right, too!
customer_reviews.author: llaam

customer_reviews.title: Well made, does it's purpose.
customer_reviews.text: This was shipped in the most gigantic box ever and even so part of the pole was sticking out the side. Not sure how that happened but the pole itself is fine and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: VectorWega

customer_reviews.title: IT'S FOR THE BIRDS!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time in perfect condition and is way sturdier and nicer than the other two I got from my local hardware store. I hang a seed ball on it and watch all my birds have a blast!
customer_reviews.author: cave creek grannie

customer_reviews.title: My sister-in-law loved it. My dad had a fit about having ...
customer_reviews.text: My sister-in-law loved it. My dad had a fit about having it laying around the Christmas tree but it was worth it to see her face lite up when she saw it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom to cutie son

customer_reviews.title: Handsome and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived promptly, is very sturdy and attractive. It’s in use for about a week now and withstanding all the weather admirably. I really do like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have this hanger in a tree stump holding a heavy bird feeder and it works perfectly! Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Gaelic Lassie

customer_reviews.title: Not as strong as they seem
customer_reviews.text: Got these to hang some small flowers and a bug zapper. They seem pretty sturdy but the small hanging flower I put on one has managed to slowly bend it down.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A bit too flimsy for h-bird feeder
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hook to hang a hummingbird feeder. Unfortunately, it is too flimsy for that purpose. Perhaps a small hanging plant 3 inch pot. Not much more than that
customer_reviews.author: agster

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Will not stay up In soft ground with a windy day, needs longer stakes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Find!
customer_reviews.text: The Shepherd hooks are very sturdy I can use them for hanging plants, lanterns, etc... I looked at a lot of hooks before I bought these and I'm very happy I did! They're excellent quality and strong & sturdy. A Great Find!!
customer_reviews.author: alicyn west

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my hummingbird feeders. Great height. It broke when I installed it but they quickly dent me replacements and I haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Love these for lanterns and bird and hummingbird feeder
customer_reviews.text: Love these for lanterns and bird and hummingbird feeder. My only beef is the boxes they use to ship are HUGE.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well better than attaching to the house
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Used it to hang some Christmas garland and wreath with lights outside. Worked very well better than attaching to the house.
customer_reviews.author: B A Mather

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Looks great in my backyard. Needed something to hang a beautiful jellyfish aqua wind chime by the pool. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: M Parks

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy hook. For the price I was definitely pleased. You could hang a large flower basket on this hook and it would be fine. Great value and quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: COgirlinFL

customer_reviews.title: Hummingbird hang out
customer_reviews.text: Attached out hummingbird feeder to this simple hook and it's a hit with the hummingbirds...well built, simple, good craftsmanship, great price.
customer_reviews.author: ymgbs

customer_reviews.title: Good hook, happy hummingbirds
customer_reviews.text: Just needed a simple hoot for hanging a hummingbird feeder. Arrived quickly and now my hummingbirds are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: The hummingbirds have found the feeder, which is hanging on the GrayBunny, which easily went into the ground and hopefully is substantial enough to withstand the winds we sometimes have.
customer_reviews.author: W. J. C. Hussey

product_meta.title: Shepherd Hook, 48 Inch Black 2/5 Inch Thick, Super Strong Rust Resistant Premium Metal Hook For Weddings, Hanging Plant Baskets, Solar Lights Lanterns Bird Feeders Mason Jars & Plant Hangers
product_meta.description:
Item Package Quantity:1| Color:Black

Add A Touch of Elegance To Your Garden or Outdoor Event!

A Traditional Style, Multi-Purpose Shepherd Hook
- Beautify your outdoor living space by hanging planters, flower pots, bird feeders, lanterns, mason jars, holiday decorations, wind chimes, ornaments and more!
- A classic and timeless look that effectively embellishes your garden or event space.
- 48 Inches tall minus 6.5 inches in the ground.
- Endless applications! Use it in flower beds, at weddings, while camping, or even at gravesites. 

Ornate With a Refined Look
- With a dark finish and immaculate shine, this hook complements anything that you choose to hang on it.
- Looks visually stunning in your flower bed or other locations.
- Blends seamlessly into its surroundings and goes great with most other colors. 

 GrayBunny Quality
- Premium quality metal that's thin yet sturdy, rust resistant and durable. 2/5 Inch diameter is thicker than similar hooks from other brands. Bring your heaviest bird house or flower basket!
- Extra-long and double forked base prongs maintain a fixed, upright posture while remaining firmly planted in the ground.
- Designed by the brightest minds, utilizing only the highest quality materials and expert manufacturing methodologies, GrayBunny offers premium products for your lawn and garden while exceeding highest industry standards and offering impeccable customer care. 

"No Worries" Guarantee
If you'd like your money back, no worries. Anytime. Just ask. 

Click the "Add to Cart" button on top to accessorize your outdoor living or event space now!
feature_bullets: MULTI-PURPOSE: Beautify your outdoor living space by hanging planters, flower pots, bird feeders, lanterns, garden lights, mason jars, holiday decorations, string lights, wind chimes, ornaments, flower balls, bird baths, and more!

PREMIUM QUALITY: Rust resistant, heavy duty steel construction. With a 2/5 inch diameter that is thicker than similar hooks from other brands, you can be confident you're getting the strongest shepherd hook on the market! Double forked and extra-long base prongs maintain a fixed, upright posture while remaining firmly planted in the ground. Bring your heaviest pots and baskets!
STYLISH: Traditional look and dark finish adds elegance and beauty to your garden. Possesses an immaculate shine and stunningly complements anything that hangs from it.

VERSATILE: Endless applications include hanging insect repellents, shooting targets, isle markers, buckets of sand for ashtrays, and more. Use it in flower beds, at weddings, while camping, or even at gravesites. Constantly discover new and useful functions.

GUARANTEE: GrayBunny offers premium products for your lawn and garden while exceeding highest industry standards and offering impeccable customer care. With a lifetime guarantee, if you'd like your money back at any time, just ask. Click the "Add to cart" button to adorn your outdoor living or event space now!
